title: 15 products every Disney lover should have in their home
text:
You can now bring the magic of Disney into your home — even if you don't have access to the parks.

Home products that have been inspired by Disney and its most beloved characters can be found on sites including Amazon, Etsy, and the Disney Store, of course.

There are Disney items for every room of your house, including a Mickey waffle maker, Lilo and Stitch salt and pepper shakers, and a candle inspired by Snow White.

Visit Insider's homepage for more stories.

Most Disney superfans would love to soak up the magic at Disney World as often as possible. The responsibilities of reality make that unrealistic, but there are plenty of ways to bring Disney into your everyday life.

There are countless Disney products on the market that will make your home feel more like the Magic Kingdom. From Mickey-themed waffle makers and cheese boards, to Lilo and Stitch salt and pepper shakers and a Mrs. Potts teapot, there's truly something for everyone.

Here are 15 products every Disney lover should have in their home.
description: From a Mickey-shaped waffle maker to a Mrs. Potts teapot, Disney lovers will want to fill their homes with these magical products.
